snippet: What lies beneath New York’s waterways has not been documented with precision, but it provides grist for a new exhibition and talks at the South Street Seaport Museum.
abstract: What lies beneath New York’s waterways has not been documented with precision, but it provides grist for a new exhibition and talks at the South Street Seaport Museum.

headline.main: Underwater, a Train, a Dinette and Don't Forget the Chevy
headline.print_headline: Underwater Riches Include a Piano, a Train, and Don’t Forget the Chevy
